content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0, 0)) with inventory: {'coal': 19}
- Stone furnace (position (2, 0)) with inventory: {'coal': 16} and produces {'copper-plate': 18}

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace. For example, you encountered errors when trying to insert coal and copper ore into the furnaces without having them in your inventory.

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure you have the necessary crafting machines or furnaces available to craft items. You faced an error while trying to craft electronic circuits due to insufficient copper plates, which require a furnace to produce.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items. 

### Errors when placing items into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. You encountered issues with inserting items into furnaces that were not ready to accept them.
